Celebrating SAP team members driving innovation with AI

‚≠ê This Week's Feature

Jacob Brass

SAP Data & Analytics

ü§ñ HerveBot

Jacob developed HerveBot, an automated pricing approval bot that's transforming how the field team handles pricing exception requests.

Before HerveBot, field reps had to manually reach out for pricing guidance, creating bottlenecks and delays in the sales process. Jacob saw an opportunity to leverage AI to automate responses to common pricing questions, freeing up the team to focus on more complex, high-value interactions.

The bot uses intelligent automation to instantly answer questions about pricing exceptions, pulling from approved guidelines and historical decisions to provide accurate, consistent responses around the clock.

üìâ 75% reduction in field interactions
